DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy safety vildagliptin combination metformin 500 mg bid compare metformin 1000 mg bid patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy/Safety Vildagliptin Metformin Combination Therapy Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Not Well Controlled With Metformin Alone
DOC.criteria: 1878 year inclusive Type 2 diabetes diagnosis least 2 month prior study entry Body mass index range 2245 kg/m2 HbA1c range 6.5 9 % inclusive Fasting plasma glucose < 270 mg/dL ( 15 mmol/L ) A history type 1 diabetes Evidence significant diabetic complication Treatment insulin oral antidiabetic agent Congestive heart failure require pharmacologic treatment Clinically significant renal dysfunction define metformin label criterion ( serum creatinine level > /= 1.5 mg/dl ( male ) > /= 1.4 mg/dl ( female ) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
